data.title: Torment [Hets] (Original photograph of Mai Zetterling from the 1944 film) by Ingmar Bergman (screenwriter); Alf Sjoberg (director); Stig Jarrel, Alf Kjellin, Mai Zetterling (starring)
data.meta_description: N.p.: N.p., 1944. Vintage reference photograph from the 1944 film, showing actress Mai Zetterling. Despite the sadistic mistreatment of his Latin...
data.text: You can be confident that when you make a purchase through ABAA.org, the item is sold by an ABAA member in full compliance with our Code of Ethics. Our sellers guarantee your order will be shipped promptly and that all items are as described. Buy with confidence through ABAA.org.
